iconic_games.title: Super Mario Bros.
iconic_games.significance: Defined the platformer genre and helped revitalize the video game industry after the crash of 1983

iconic_games.title: Tetris
iconic_games.significance: One of the most recognizable puzzle games ever created, with simple yet addictive gameplay

iconic_games.title: Pac-Man
iconic_games.significance: Cultural phenomenon that transcended gaming and became a pop culture icon

iconic_games.title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
iconic_games.significance: Revolutionized 3D adventure games with its innovative targeting system and immersive world

iconic_games.title: Minecraft
iconic_games.significance: Redefined creativity in gaming with its open-world sandbox gameplay

iconic_games.title: Doom
iconic_games.significance: Pioneered the first-person shooter genre and popularized multiplayer gaming

iconic_games.title: World of Warcraft
iconic_games.significance: Defined the MMORPG genre and created a virtual world with millions of players

iconic_games.title: Grand Theft Auto III
iconic_games.significance: Revolutionized open-world game design with its 3D sandbox environment

iconic_games.title: Space Invaders
iconic_games.significance: One of the earliest shooting games that helped establish the video game industry

iconic_games.significance: Launched one of the most successful entertainment franchises of all time
